attributes.action: Stop the increase in minimum retirement age to 55 in 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present the earliest retirement date in receipt of pension is 50 and this is due to increase in 2011 to 55 years old. The effect of this will be to restrict when people can take their pension (and perhaps stop them benefiting from favourable annuity rates) and to reduce the number of job vacancies
